Review.Titre: Absolutely terrible service
Review.Contenu: Absolutely terrible service. Paid upfront to have Teletrac put cameras on our vehicle las week. The people who were employed to do it didn't finish the job and informed us that they couldn't go back as they were now on other jobs. Teletrac were unable to help as the person who was dealing with it was not in the office! we have been withourt a vehicle for a week and still no sign of a resolution. Don't use Teletrac!

Review.Titre: Do yourself a favour find someone else for tracking
Review.Contenu: Would love to give it a zero but no option. 3 tractor units all stopped tracking. Teletrac have "logged it" 2 weeks to get an engineer out. No response about any kind of credit for lack of service. Just one in a long list of poor service and arms length customer service that is good at logging stuff, but unable to resolve anything.

Review.Titre: Very bad service
Review.Contenu: Very bad service , had new trackers fitted 3 weeks ago but can not get them added to our tracking screen******* UPDATE **********Still no contact so we have had no option but to cancel any payments due, We have been advised by citizen advice that we can have the trackers removed and return along with the invoice for removal .

Review.Titre: NON RENEW NOW
Review.Contenu: My fleet decreased and they have ZERO terms for reduction or cancellation.  I have to continue to pay $471 per month for 36 months.  I never expected them to just let me out, but did think there was some option (was even willing to pay a cancellation fee).  They auto renew and you are just STUCK.

Review.Titre: There are better GPS tracking websites/services out there
Review.Contenu: Since I signed up with Teletrac Navman I've had a constant stream of problems, some of which have been resolved and some not. I've had issues with the tracking devices not tracking mileages accurately; I've had issues with not being able to calibrate our vehicle's mileages on the website; I've had issues with getting tracking devices installed in our vehicles; I've had issues with not being able to edit the users on the website in spite of being the site Admin. Those are just a few of the many problems that I've had. The customer service has been fairly helpful, but their response times are hit or miss. When our contract runs out I will not be renewing with Teletrac.

Review.Titre: Careless installer
Review.Contenu: This review is for the installer. Cannot comment on the tracker functionality. Installer left my van dirty, with scratches and a dent in the passe ger door. Did not tell anyone, just dropped the keys and went out. Very poor care with other people's properties. Just because it is a working van, doesn't mean can be treated like that!

Review.Titre: THIS IS A HORRIBLE PRODUCT!
Review.Contenu: We started dealing with Navman in June of 2022.  If I had it to do all over again- I would never have made the call.  At first everyone we spoke with was nice but as time went along and we started calling in with the issues we were having, no one ever returned our calls. In the last 6 months we tried emailing and calling both to get an address to return the unused boxes and have had no reply.  We even told them we were going to stop paying for the contract and still no reply.  These eld boxes are a joke.  They do not work as far as tracking you and the locator was never correct. Also, they sold me these on the pretext that there was IFTA reporting capabilities and then tried to tell me that was only if i input all mileage manually. We had a driver get an HOS violation due to the eld - we are still not sure why because he had done everything exactly as he should have.

Review.Titre: Still no update a Month later.
Review.Contenu: Still no update a Month later.Requested new trackers, raised a complaint, called multiple times. No update given, a joke

Review.Titre: Avoid if you can
Review.Contenu: A few issues are still outstanding raised over 2 months ago. Communication with our account manager and customer support is hard. Not answering calls or replying to emails. I have tried to schedule a meeting with account manager and support team management to gain an understanding on what can be done to resolve reported issues and ETA's- 4 weeks on, still no meeting scheduled. Currently, we will not be offering any further work to Teletrac Navman until services and relations improve. Referring to TN360- Website advertised functions do not work as advertised or communicated during sales appointments.

Review.Titre: Technology is poor.
Review.Contenu: I bought the package that includes a key fob that you need to be in the car with you when driving.  I’m am now on my third set in 12 months as they somehow keep being disconnected from the tracker system.  Today the third set also gave up so I assume set 4 is on the way!  I have a three year package.  I wonder how many fobs I’ll have before my subscription expires?  At this rate it will be around 9.  Still they are very good at sending new ones when there hardware fails.  Again.

Review.Titre: Deserves No stars
Review.Contenu: Deserves No stars. We have a 2018 van that has a Teletrac Navman satnav system which came with the new van.  In June we had a reminder for the renewal of £99.00 to keep using which we paid.  Today we called them to ask how we update system to show new roads, was told NO you cannot do that as they do not update the maps.  When asked what we do about all the new roads we were told, well they have the main roads on!  What a Joke this company is, if they had told us that we could never update the system we would not have renewed.

Review.Titre: I wish I could give them -100 stars!
Review.Contenu: I wish I could give them -100 stars! You are never able to talk to anyone above a customer service person. My issues have been going for 2yrs and allI hear is we will have to escalate your issue. Just went through an IFTA audit and almost every month there is a problem with miles tracking and or start and finish mileage is not adding correctly! All im told is we have to escalate your issue. I email them daily telling them my equipment doesnt work, their plug and play units to 4G do not work with my PTO's or Cameras and they want me to pay to upgrade and install all new equipment. I have never seen such a useless management team. Now when I call customer service to check to see if they have any new information for me I'm told I need to talk to technical support when I'm transferred to technical support they tell me it's a customer service issue then transfer me back to customer support. Then I'm told they will have to escalate this. I tried cancelling but they want me to buy out the rest of my contract for thousands. I resigned a contract 24 months ago and my equipment has never worked correctly since day one! STAY AWAY!

Review.Titre: Terrible
Review.Contenu: If I could give this company zero rating I would. The Trackstar service and technology is absolutely terrible! The tags never work. I have had mine replaced multiple times and they are continually giving me false alarms. You can not speak to someone in customer service, they only give an email and then never respond to requests. There seems to be no complaint process. When you do speak to a service rep they are very unhelpful and argumentative. When I requested new tags I received the instruction in bold to return the faulty tags or you will be charged which sums up the view of the customer with this company! What about if you get zero customer support and your technology never works properly we will be happy to compensate you and have that in bold! The problem I feel is because of the deal this company has done with BMW etc. you have their technology when you buy the car and it’s not easy to change. This creates complacency within the company and no desire to improve. Certainly when I buy a new car in the future I will check if this technology is installed and this will heavily influence my decision to purchase the car or not.

Review.Titre: Do not recommend.
Review.Contenu: I'm on my second set of fobs after just over a year. The first set lasted 2-3 months before the alarm went off every time I got in the car. The second set have lasted around 9 months and once again, the alarm is going off every time I get in the car.I replaced the batteries as requested. Alarm goes off every time I get in the car.Their response, when it finally arrived via e-mail as they don't seem to have a customer service line only a chat bot...Take it back to your BMW dealer.Dreadful, would not recommend.

Review.Titre: Would give it a zero if I had the…
Review.Contenu: Would give it a zero if I had the option.   Non existent customer service.

Review.Titre: The company stopped offering service but continued charging us!
Review.Contenu: The company stopped offering service for the units we had installed in our vans back in February of 2022. We were never notified that service would not be ending but we were continually charged the monthly service. We contacted them in July when we noticed that it was not tracking our vehicles. We were then told we would have to upgrade to the new version 4G units so the systems would work. if we agreed to pay for the units and signed a new contract we would be credited for the past charges going back to February 2022.  We agreed and waited for an email  with a new contract. We never recieved an email but were charged the following month for service and we have been charged every month since. We have contacted them every month and have been told a different story each time. We reached out again today 1/24/2023 to try and get credited and new units. We are giving up and going to our credit card company in hopes of having the charges credited. If you are thinking of tracking for your fleet vehicles. DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY AS THEY ARE SCAMMERS!case# 01091645

Review.Titre: No desire for problem solving or customer retention
Review.Contenu: What a disappointment.  We have had Teletrac in three of our work trucks for several years.  We lost communication with our vehicles on 6/7/22. We needed to add a new work truck to our account as well, so I called. There was a migration from 3G to 4G that required new equipment in our existing vehicles, that's why no service.  To add the new truck there was no charge for equipment and a 3 year contract.  We paid $139 per vehicle for the 4G upgrade with no contact extension on the existing vehicles.  We received plug and play equipment that we had to SELF INSTALL.  Seems that this isn't the best equipment for tampering, but the self install is above my pay grade.  I was told I could pay $179 per vehicle and wait 2-3 months to have the upgrade installed.  I asked how could it be that I could order equipment for our new vehicle at no charge and only pay the monthly fee for software reporting and have it installed in 8 calendar days - and yet it would be $318 per vehicle for equipment and installation done within 2 months for vehicles that we have been paying the monthly fee for, for years.  I was met with a canned response that the company "tried to do it the best way they could".  No concern that we have been customers for years.  I was given the email address to write my cancellation to and told that I may still owe for the contracts that were never extended.  No regard for our business, no desire to retain us as customers.

Review.Titre: I was given a series of links- I…
Review.Contenu: I was given a series of links- I appreciate extra information- but no answer to my question- only a series of links.

Review.Titre: Get a better system because I'm always…
Review.Contenu: Get a better system because I'm always having problems logging on its always non responsive

Review.Titre: Great software but i've had better…
Review.Contenu: Great software but i've had better customer service from a mugger.

Review.Titre: Not helpful
Review.Contenu: Not helpful and asked really irrelevant, borderline dumb questions.

Review.Titre: The worst customer service
Review.Contenu: The worst customer service.  On my 6th attempt to sort new contract and cancel/send back unused trackers and no one answering my emails.  When you call they tell you to email, which they don't answer and tell you they haven't received any email?  Now on hold waiting to cancel the whole contract.  After 15 minutes I decide to call them back to speak to someone else.

Review.Titre: Careless and sloppy security and procedures
Review.Contenu: I keep getting alerts that my car is being driven without the tracking fob. In all cases this has been incorrect so a new fob was dispatched (very promptly) to an incomplete address which could have easily lead to somebody else acquiring it.No instructions with it either as I presume/hope (for security reasons) it needs some form of ID to activate it.

Review.Titre: Poor customer service.
Review.Contenu: I paid £49 renewal for camera speed warning. this did not work so I was told it would be rebooted,this also did not work,I was then told my older system was no longer supported and I should ask for a refund by email.this I have done twice.Allmost one month now and not even recognition of receipt of my email.Poor show.

Review.Titre: Been trying to cancel for 6 months and…
Review.Contenu: Been trying to cancel for 6 months and all we get back is you have to pay the 3 year contract in full even though we never asked for it to be renewed.System stops working on a regular basis we don’t even report it anymore.Would never use them again.

Review.Titre: I can see why Teletrac has bad reviews
Review.Contenu: I can see why Teletrac has bad reviews.  Teletrac's tech is not as advertised.  Promises do not add up to what they can provide.  When pressed for a demo, the Director of Sales said that she cannot send out less than 30 units which must be under contract....and then required a contract for 200 units.  We use thousands of GPS units, but needed to demo and review their product further because of discrepancies in what different sales reps said their product could do.  Other companies provide a demo, and we've found that there are several companies whose tech actually works.

Review.Titre: FURTHER TO MY FIRST REVIEW
Review.Contenu: FURTHER TO MY FIRST REVIEW, DON'T USE THIS COMPANY AS THEY DO NOT RETURN FUNDS WHEN YOU SELL A VEHICLE. THEY ALSO MAINTAIN THAT BY REPLYING ( ON TRUSTPILOT) TO YOUR BAD REVIEW THAT THEY WILL LOOK INTO IT (HAVING GIVEN INVOICE NUMBERS AND DATES) - STILL WAITING TO HEAR FROM THEM TWO WEEKS LATER. THERE ARE BETTER COMPANIES TO DEAL WITH OUT THERE!!!

Review.Titre: Avoid
Review.Contenu: I have been trying to get a buyout price from this company for almost 2 months... no one answers or returns calls and don't even think about emailing... that message most likely gets sent straight to the trash folder. All I am hoping for is a buyout price so our company can never cross paths with Teletrac ever again. Hopefully this review gets a response since my last one from 2018 DID NOT.

Review.Titre: I was really exited about switching to…
Review.Contenu: I was really exited about switching to new service , but not anymore . When the service got sold to me it was brilliant and really promising, so far I’m really disappointed. I am still waiting for “somebody” to contact me to show me how to use and set up my app. So far my verizon connect that I was switching from is working better and GPS app features offer more. I am thinking of canceling your service.

Review.Titre: Aslong as they have there money, they go quiet
Review.Contenu: Having problems resolving an ongoing issues with ATS trackers. Company more then happy to take the money. Agreed on a return and refund but 30 days later, no one seems interested. Still being charged for 8 units we do not have and that did not work. Hopefully this prompts a response from someone in there management team. Other then that. The vehicle trackers we have installed on our fleet with perfectly. Few teething problems but apart from that. All Good

Review.Titre: Teletrac navman bunch of cowboys…
Review.Contenu: Avoid teletrac navman bunch of cowboys charge for extras and even want paying when out of contract... which they just renew themselves with out any warning try to get you to sign upto 3 year contract when only a 1 year contract was agree (please read small print with these guys) they should be wearing masks total rip off merchants AVOID AVOID AVOID

Review.Titre: Posting until someone actually calls and sorts this problem
Review.Contenu: Having problems resolving an ongoing issues with ATS trackers. Company more then happy to take the money. Agreed on a return and refund but 30 days later, no one seems interested. Still being charged for 8 units we do not have and that did not work. Hopefully this prompts a response from someone in there management team.

Review.Titre: What a crap Company.
Review.Contenu: I have had a Teletrac Navman for 3 years now, I have had nothing but trouble with it. I recently sent the screen back to them for a replacement and they sent the new one to the wrong address so I still have no service, I have emailed the 3 times now and get no replies. what a crap company.

Review.Titre: Is anyone going to contact me
Review.Contenu: Having problems resolving an ongoing issues with ATS trackers. Company more then happy to take the money. Agreed on a return and refund but 30 days later, no one seems interested. Still being charged for 8 units we do not have and that did not work. Hopefully this prompts a response from someone in there management team.Day 5, promise of someone contacting regarding this issue and still nothing. * The correct people I need to speak are not available via calling them, they apparently need to call me*

Review.Titre: Seriously lacking in billing and customer service…
Review.Contenu: Lacking in billing and customer service Not able to send addresses to drivers thru the mobile app for the last 3 years. Advised them several times and still no change. Billing.... do not expect to receive any refunds or price adjustments if out of contract or cancelled lines and they make the error on updating.Move on

Review.Titre: The only reason I gave them one star is…
Review.Contenu: The only reason I gave them one star is because there is no spot for NEGATIVE stars!    Their customer service is HORRID!!   Our ELDs do not work,  I have contacted them at least 6 times on this issue and they have STILL not created a work order to have someone come out and fix them.  I even sent an email to the president of the company, and still, our issues are not resolved!   Stay away from this company!

Review.Titre: Tele trac
Review.Contenu: I have bought a Citroen Berlingo enterprise van with Teletrac navman installed, the van was ten months old , now it has just turned one year old , teletrac stopped working, hard to contact teletrac using the pa button, and have had a call back from a reception lady who took my details, she said I should have a reply with in 24 to 48 hours , four days now and no reply, my sat nav was never registered from new probably because the previous owner had similar problems. So not impressed.

Review.Titre: E-mail me your phone number for an honest review!
Review.Contenu: I am so upset with the customer support at Navman, that if you e-mail me your phone number, I will personally call you and give you 100 reasons why you should avoid this company at all cost!Dave.Legault@ Johnnystowing.com Do yourself a favor, and read the reviews before signing up, there are many customers on many sites with many issues.  DO NOT GET INVOLVED

Review.Titre: By far the worst customer service I…
Review.Contenu: By far the worst customer service I have ever dealt with by a huge margin, very rarely get any response from sales, wait for ever for replacement units, can never get them fitted, they can never get invoicing correct, we are based less than a mile away from Keele offices, we have been a customer for 15 years with over 200 cubes and mnav units. We will be leaving this company end of contract they have no interest in us as a business so we now feel the same.

Review.Titre: Turned our company over to a collection attorney
Review.Contenu: Turned our company over to a collection attorney after a year of interrupted service. Attorney said our company owed 3500.00. We were under the impression that our account was set up as auto pay which turned out it wasn't. We were unaware. No interruption in service and no phone call or letter from Teletrac for over a year. We found out from a attorneys phone call. HORRIBLE customer service. NEARLY IMPOSSIBLE TO CANCEL CONTRACT WITH THEM BEWARE!

Review.Titre: Terrible Business Attitude.
Review.Contenu: I don't even know where to start with this company - UK TeletracNavman*Customer Service = Zero*Sales = Zero (Mis-Sold Products)*Repairs = Zero*Terms - 90 days to resolve any problems.Breached Terms and won't terminate contract under their own terms.Emailed Head of Operations UK, and also Head of Finance UK - Zero Response. Terrible Business Attitude.

Review.Titre: Terrible Customer Support
Review.Contenu: Customer support cannot handle any situation other than a quick troubleshoot. They will then proceed to open a support ticket. When finally contacted on the more difficult matter, I missed their call and they closed the case the following Monday after 2 months of waiting for a response! My unit has been down this entire time, and I'm just praying DOT doesn't stop my vehicle. DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY.

Review.Titre: Customer service is very poor
Review.Contenu: Customer service is very poor, communication and responses are extremely slow or non existent. The sales rep did not point out clause 6.2 of the T&C's (my error for not reading the 5 pages of small print) so be very aware and cautious of using this company. I will not be recommending any of our clients or colleagues to use them.

Review.Titre: Worst service!
Review.Contenu: Worst service!It has now been OVER 3 months since the request for service was made with no appointment or date of service.My company has been a long time customer for years. I have stayed on hold for hours over the last several months, sent countless emails and all I receive is a case number with the false claims of being contacted soon. We are now shopping for a new carrier.WORST SERVICE EVER!

Review.Titre: Made several calls cannot get a…
Review.Contenu: Made several calls cannot get a response always promised a technician would call us back none of this equipment works we cannot get anyone to help us nor tried to fix the situation We been 4 months now trying to get it to work we cannot get it fixed nor get any help to have a solution or a resolve to this issue It keeps coming on with ELD malfunctioning revert to paper logs 3 out of the 3 on ELD

Review.Titre: The software issues are beyond…
Review.Contenu: The software issues are beyond ridiculous, I have not had properly working equipment for Six months, Lori Herrera is the only one so far that has been able to fix any of our issues, she is incredible, the software and equipment issues are still a problem even though she continuosly fixes them then something else goes wrong.

Review.Titre: Teletrac ignore cancellation requests for over 2 years!!!!
Review.Contenu: I have been a customer for a number of years and the product is good. Staff are always polite however when you try to cancel a subscription for vehicle tracking this company is frustratingly awkward. I have a vehicle that we have been trying to close a subscription since May 2016!!! Communication has been poor and nobody seems able to get this sorted after yet more phone calls and emails this week. Please sort this out and process my refund in good faith.

Review.Titre: Horrible company to work with
Review.Contenu: Horrible company to work with, when you initially sign up you think you are signing a 36-month contract, if you add a device they create a new contract on the date you add it, so its impossible to cancel all your devices.  On top of this, we spent 6 months trying to cancel, and nobody would call us, outrageous.  Never do business with this company.

Review.Titre: Your equipment sucks horribly!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Review.Contenu: I deal with a about 5 techs that are totally amazing. The so called service manager in charge of our account doesn't exist.  Not one bit of communication.  I get more response out of our sales rep. The main issues I have is the equipment sucks.  I am constantly having to call and get repairs.  I get replacements and they don't work.  With the new DOT regulations the pathetic equipment is going to get everyone in trouble.

Review.Titre: ELD Devices are horrible since the …
Review.Contenu: ELD Devices are horrible since the first day we received them, they are constantly freezing up and having more issues. My drivers started getting violations because of those devices.This company is horrible to work with.Customer service sucks!!!! NOT HELPFUL UNPROFESSIONAL Can never get ahold of the management! PEOPLE BE AWARE WHAT YOU GETTING YOURSELVES IN TO

Review.Titre: Absolutely awful customer service!
Review.Contenu: Absolutely awful customer service. Repeated official complaints ignored by several different people. Requests for settlement bill ignored. No help with system. No communication. My advice - Stay well away!! UPDATE - nobody answered the customer care no. listed in their reply below. Had already made 9 months of calls and emails before resorting to this bad review.

Review.Titre: WORST ELD PROVIDER
Review.Contenu: After 6 weeks with unit down and no resolution in sight, we had to park our truck for CSA week as we did not want any violations for their HORRIBLE product.  Have had so many issues since day 1 it’s ridiculous.  And as others have commented, you are stuck in a three year contract.  HORRIBLE company... read the reviews .

Review.Titre: Taggart Transportation Account set up not complete
Review.Contenu: The person helped with my log in and account with the company, but the driver logs are the only part that showed up, I have no vehicles in my sign in account. The drivers did not show up on the rest of the administrations login accts.Our entire account needs to be brought up to the new standard. Please fix ASAP.

Review.Titre: Teletrac is the worst expience that I …
Review.Contenu: Teletrac is the worst expience that I have every day and if I could get out of my contract I would in a heart beat. From the price savings that never happened to the continual logging in problems to the not being able to trac  my guy's from my phone to the inability for my guys to use the system because of the inconvenience of it. I couldn't be more unhappy!!!

Review.Titre: Teletrac is the worst vendor I have …
Review.Contenu: Teletrac is the worst vendor I have ever had. We have been loyal customers for over 20 + years. Can't seem to get any help with our fleet tracking issuesWE ARE MOVING ON..their customer service skills are horrible. We've been told Verizon-Network Fleet run a good ship, and are half the cost. With a 30 vehicle fleet we need someone we can depend on. They are not it.Jesse ChavezPresident / OwnerBerkel MidwestChicago, IL

Review.Titre: Dreadful customer service
Review.Contenu: Dreadful customer service. Need them to come out to correct problems? That will cost you. Meanwhile the cameras are hanging off the windscreens as the equipment is poorly (and as cheaply) fitted as possible. Avoid at all costs. Appalling service from the start. And plainly nobody there actually cares.

Review.Titre: WARNING!!!
Review.Contenu: unfortunately the customer service has been terrible i would also seriously advise people to read the ts+ cs carefully. We were unhappy with the service and wanted to change companies. But to buy out of around 10 trackers they told us it would cost 30K to cancel.I would strongly recommend to be careful and where possible to avoid completely

Review.Titre: VERY BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE TODAY
Review.Contenu: VERY BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE TODAY. NO ONE WAS ABLE TO HELP ME WITH MY ISSUE. NO STRAIGHT ANSWER. SPOKE TO JOEL ID#6451 HE WAS VERY RUDE. I ASKED TO SPEAK TO SOMEONE ELSE AND TOLD ME THAT IF I WANTED TO SPEAK TO SOMEONE ELSE TO HANG UP AND CALL BACK AGAIN. HE REFUSED TO LET ME SPEAK TO HIS SUPERVISOR.

Review.Titre: I desperately wish they would stop harassing us!
Review.Contenu: I feel really disappointed that I have to write a public review on a company that I’ve never dealt with, however... on New Years Eve I bought the Assets and Goodwill of a business that had been a Teletrac Navman customer and notified the company very soon after the takeover.Since then I have been bombarded with Invoices and Statements that are meant for the previous Owner, I have called, emailed and written but they are so ignorant! God help anyone who actually has an account with them!

Review.Titre: Purchase of a new unit for Vehicle WM58 GDX
Review.Contenu: Awful process from start to finish.  The original order was lost/mislaid by Adam Lamont. I ordered it on the 30th March.  To date, the PTO unit of the Navman has never reported data.  After many emails and phone calls an engineer is allegedly attending tomorrow - the 27th May 2015. I have escalated this matter to my MD and we are looking to move all the account as a result of the way this order has been managed.

Review.Titre: I have been waiting 2 full weeks for a …
Review.Contenu: I have been waiting 2 full weeks for a response. I have left messages for 5 separate people including the vice president of this company who has 3 messages from me.  NO RESPONSE form anyone. We have been a customer for 2+ years and our system has an integration issue that prevents it from functioning properly. By far the worst customer service I have ever experienced. Hopefully someone higher in this organization actually reads these reviews and I can actually get a response.

Review.Titre: Very poor customer service!!!
Review.Contenu: Do not use!!!!  We have been trying to get someone to answer basic questions since December of 2017.  I start sending emails again in March and finally someone responds and he can't help me because he is in the retention department.  He forwards to our account mgr.  It's been another two weeks and our assigned account Mgr. has not responded.  This company uses delay tactics when it comes to cancelling services.  Emails go an answered for months at a time.  Very disappointing!

Review.Titre: Absolutely awful customer service
Review.Contenu: Absolutely awful customer service. Repeated official complaints ignored by several different people. We have filled out on line about 2 different issues. With no response. I was promised call back. Didn't happen. I was gave a number that was our customer rep 817 323 1469. Ha! I tried that number. What do you know...it's no longer a working number.  I have been a customer over 10 years. I am done with the lies and run around. No communication. My advice - Stay well away!!

Review.Titre: Would be great if all of my GPS's…
Review.Contenu: Would be great if all of my GPS's worked, and didn't constantly leg. I have multiple trucks with screens that don't work and for three weeks now I've been told by the tech department that "were working on it" or "I'm sending this up the ladder to another department". Telling me to turn off and turn on the screens or make sure they are charging. This has been an issue since Navman did a system update: it knocked 14 of my trucks offline and 6 trucks screens all stopped working at the exact same time.

Review.Titre: When I was getting information on the…
Review.Contenu: When I was getting information on the devices sales person was excellent. After we signed he stopped answering emails. I asked for a supervisors name and gave me a number that mailbox was full couldn't leave a message. I emailed no response. I still haven't received my devices after 2 weeks of signing so beware!!!

Review.Titre: They do not care about their customers..
Review.Contenu: If you are considering buying a Smartnav system from Teletrac Navman and you want good customer service DO NOT BOTHER. I've been a customer of Teletrac for over 10 years and recently had a new system installed. I have been trying to contact their customer service for over two weeks with a problem on my new Smatnav, even leaving messages for a manager call back and had absolutely no response. This is not what you expect from a company. They care more about selling products than their customers.

Review.Titre: I am not pleased at all with the…
Review.Contenu: I am not pleased at all with the customer service from Teletrac.  It usually takes 45 minutes to an hour on hold to get in touch with anyone .  I have called my account manager and left voice mails, sent emails....nothing ever happens.  The person I spoke to the last time I called was very helpful although the equipment that  I was supposed to receive hasn't shown up.  I was then transferred me to my account manager and of course nothing...crickets.  Very unimpressed with the customer service.

Review.Titre: Absolutely junk!
Review.Contenu: Absolutely junk!Logs me off while driving 5-6 times a day. I waste time every day trying to stay in compliance. It's unsafe to me because I'm always stopping on roadside to fix it !It's lilable to cause a accident because of malfunctions.. and demands it requires to get working properly..Junk!!

Review.Titre: This is a follow up
Review.Contenu: This is a follow up!  I am still getting bills from this company and they never delivered the product!  It was never installed and never delivered but they keep telling me I have to pay anyway....  I can't wait to see them explain this in a courtroom when they take me to collections!  Stop Billing Me.  They respond on complaints, but no one follows up.  Run do not use this company - if you ever needed anyone to help with an issue you would never hear from them again, except through your monthly billing!

Review.Titre: Cheap bits of plastic with less…
Review.Contenu: Cheap bits of plastic with less technology than a 1980s calculator, for which they charge £60-£80 a time; unhelpful staff passing the buck between themselves and dealers; instructions that look like you’re running the lunar landing project; appalling communications, sporadic, relying on email. And to top everything they take money from your bank account for cars you don’t even own.I’d try anyone but these people. Goodness knows why Range Rover have them as approved suppliers. They should move on.

Review.Titre: Very crappy service you will not get …
Review.Contenu: Very crappy service you will not get ahold of nobody had done but problems I have a fleet of 15 trucks all the e-logs are on UK time cannot get ahold of nobody at this company all they tell you is they're working on it if you could get out of it get out of it very shity service stay away from this company

Review.Titre: the worse of the worse.I get alert or…
Review.Contenu: the worse of the worse.I get alert or notification 48 hours later, when my driver already speed or Ideal  or others. costumer service is the worse, no one can solve ur problem. bad English speakers..poorer quality,,,lower standard..( I'm AAA carpet cleaner.)

Review.Titre: I had been a long term user of Teletrac …
Review.Contenu: I had been a long term user of Teletrac when I had to get their upgraded units.  I upgraded my company vehicles to their latest version after they assured me they had an app that work. I was assured I could follow the vehicles on a cell or Ipad.  This product never worked!  They do not stand behind their promise of the app working and now I am forced to pay for a contract that I have not used for over two years.  If I could rate them zero I would.  There is no way I should have to pay for devices that do not work!!

Review.Titre: Let down by very bad service
Review.Contenu: Very poor experience from start to finish.Teletrac either failed to send the SD card for the dashcam or the engineer they sent to fit it lost it. This took several months to resolve. Customer support were very poor at responding to get this fixed.Upon requesting to cancel the system, an extra year seems to have been added to the contract despite having only signed up for a 24 month period. Despite still having to pay for another 8 (or 20!!) months, Teletrac have now switched off my system. If I am paying for a service, sure I should be able to use this??

Review.Titre: Worst company. Stay away unless you want a headache
Review.Contenu: We have been a customer for over three years. Worst experience ever I-10 rating. We are in need of a tracking system  but this company is the worst customer service and they are very disorganized and disconnected from all departments we are still waiting to be updated to a new were platform the units are not working correctly.  We have placed over 100 phone calls and emails over the last six months and they cannot get this resolved so we have no other option then to remove all the units and go with a different company. Maarten.Fence World

Review.Titre: There a lot better choices
Review.Contenu: Been running system for awhile. Doing edits it very frustrating and does not always take. Had unit malfunction where driver was unable to change statues and log out of system for days. Was unable to force driver logoff or even edit drivers log. There system always slow and gets bad reception. It's a pain in rear both for us in office and for drivers. Have use different ones in past with other companies and they are all better than Teletrac .Looking at getting more trucks and will be staying away from Teletrac. Have not been happy with them for years.

Review.Titre: Terrible Product Terrible Company
Review.Contenu: We have had three people in our company try to get help from this company. I have called and emailed and explained that their product does not work. My phone calls and emails have been ignored. Most recently I have emailed and called one of their reps, who has not responded either. We are trapped in a three-year contract with a product that doesn't work, with a company that doesn't respond or care to correct their defective product. I gave them a one star because zero is not an option. Don't consider this product!!

Review.Titre: Worst Customer service ever experienced…
Review.Contenu: Worst Customer service ever experienced and take weeks to respond. Ongoing problems. Conned into renewing our contract and do not care that we are unhappy as a customer as long as they get our money.

Review.Titre: Awful service
Review.Contenu: Lots of faults with trackers. Painful dealing with the service department, it takes many conversations with many different people before anything happens and then it happens very slowly. We  can't face dealing with them any longer so we will be moving to another system once the contract ends.

Review.Titre: 2 Incidents
Review.Contenu: 2 Incidents. Theft of generator, v unhelpful with deciphering the signals, more interested in CYA and so recovery was delayed. Eventually recovered but minus the trailer.Theft of van. Thieves found and removed the GPS aerial but no alert was sent. Totally ineffective.

Review.Titre: We have had an awful experience overall…
Review.Contenu: We have had an awful experience overall with Teletrac Navman. The reporting does not work, we can't get our rep to train us, the system does not allow for easy use and tracking as promised and the hardware is outdated and has to be installed in each vehicle and is not easy to move to another vehicle if you need to due to a sale or breakdown. They lock you into a 3 year contract and you have no way to get out or change once you are in, No good driver reports, no vehicle maintenance alerts, tracking is hard to find and navigate, just the whole thing has been a waste of 3 years.

Review.Titre: If I could give this company a ZERO I…
Review.Contenu: If I could give this company a ZERO I would.  Customer Support is horrible - Technical Support is just as bad.  All customer support is based in Mexico which we were never told that.  I was told today “YOU CANNOT HAVE ANY USA BASED CUSTOMER SUPPORT UNLESS YOU ARE A HIGH PAYING CUSTOMER OF OVER $10K PER YEAR”.  Wow!  Takes weeks for a technician to come out if you are having problems.  You can never speak to the same person - and plan on being on the phone for a minimum of 1 hour anytime you call!!!  I would never recommend this company for any business looking for GPS installation.Update: After reading their response, it has been 5 days and no one has reached out to me.

Review.Titre: Horrendous customer service
Review.Contenu: Horrendous customer service.  Have to wait days for assistance.  Not what we signed up for.  Switching from paper to ELD has been a nightmare.  Trying to keep up with it and we are a very small fleet.  I can only imagine what the problems a big fleet would have with this.  If we could get out without paying the penalty, we'd be gone.  Not  working right now on an issue of the ELD disappearing from a driver's unit.  We finally got it back after several days.  Went to try to update the ELD and now driver has all kinds of violations.  Utterly ridiculous.

Review.Titre: A truly awful company to deal with
Review.Contenu: A truly awful company to deal with, avoid avoid avoid.Sneaky contracts, awful hardware, non-existent support and nobody to complain to.I've learnt the hard way, please don't make the same mistake and get tied into a 3 year contract with these guys.

Review.Titre: Over 4 months for an install...
Review.Contenu: It took over 4 months for us to get everything to install a unit in one of our trucks. Everyone we spoke with always passed the buck to someone else. Very dissatisfied with the service we received. We have nearly 100 of these units total. Ever install gets worse.

Review.Titre: Slick sales operation but no customer service
Review.Contenu: Migrated to new system over 12 months ago. Van has tracker onboard but I have no way to connect with tracker. Have been asking Teletrac to sort this out for 12 months but customer support is non existent. Still insist on invoicing for a system that I cant access.

Review.Titre: CRAP SERVICE ALL THE WAY AROUND!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Sometimes hard to get a CSR that speaks…
Review.Contenu: Sometimes hard to get a CSR that speaks English well enough for me to understand them. Guess I need to learn Spanish so I can communicate with the CSRs. Also, when I am able to understand the person on the other end, there are times that it sounds like there is a fiesta going on due to the noise in the background. Been trying to get our system completely changed from AOBRD to ELD for a few months now to no avail. ELD website is always having issues. Some tasks that are needed to be done are not always available. Have to log out and hope that it is not the next day before I can check/change whatever I need to do.

Review.Titre: These guys are fraudsters.
Review.Contenu: These guys are fraudsters.They have not installed dour trackers, are charging us for a product we are not receiving & are not answering telephone calls, returning emails or returning voicemails.AVOID THESE FRAUDSTERS. I HAVE REPORTED TO TRADING STANDARDS.

Review.Titre: Terrible response to a very unhappy…
Review.Contenu: Terrible response to a very unhappy customer!    I am incredibly surprised to find any company today that, when things go terribly wrong, will send a reply that basically says "TOUGH! You are stuck in a contract".  After repeated failed attempts to get problems with our equipment (installation issues) and poor tracking performance corrected during an eleven month period, we told Teletrac we were done.  They told us they would not allow this unless we paid the balance of a three year contract.  So, now what!?  My fleet dealer can't even service my new trucks.  What a joke!  Avoid this company!

Review.Titre: Don't get involved with this company
Review.Contenu: Don't get involved with this company.  They take WEEKS to reply to emails, and if you ever want to get out of the contract they tie you up, so you have to pay THOUSANDS!  Very unreasonable, difficult company to work with.

Review.Titre: Customer Services is really really bad
Review.Contenu: Customer Services is bad, the programs gives errors, the eld gives errors, the errors gives errros... its been 3 months of nightmare and to make things worst, they charge me to send someone to fix their own equipment... like what? STAY AWAY!Carlos M

Review.Titre: A year ago my wife and I bought a brand…
Review.Contenu: A year ago my wife and I bought a brand new motorhome that came fitted with a tracker supplied by Teletrac Navman. About 6 weeks ago, the Geofence facility stopped working. This is a very important part of the service, as how else are you going to know your vehicle has been stolen? Otherwise you are going to have to wait until you get home to find it gone. And that could be way too late! Our subscription just came up for renewal (£168 for 12 months!). Despite the tracker not working as it should, no discount was offered nor any solid idea of when it would start to work properly again. Customer services is awful. AVOID AVOID AVOID.

Review.Titre: BEWARE... WORST ELD EVER
Review.Contenu: Worst decision I ever made choosing this company.  Has been nothing but PROBLEMS!!!  Dealing with them for 1 1/2 years has been horrific!  Had one unit that was down from installation for 6 months!!! Currently have had a unit down for over 4 weeks.  Trying to get parts from them is a joke!!  Please be Advised, I DO NOT RECOMMEND THEM!!!!  As for a previous review, they will not allow you to get out of contracts, even if the unit has been involved in an accident, totaled, and is not being replaced.  So now we are paying for service that we cannot use.  And somehow they think I will be a customer following the 3 years... NOT!

Review.Titre: We have 5 older teletrac units which…
Review.Contenu: We have 5 older teletrac units which work great, always have.  The 3 new units we have now have been a problem since day one.  My drivers have been having trouble logging in, logging breaks, and just communicating with the units period.  Some of the issues have been fixed but on the way to the fix I had been calling in at least 3-5 times per week, and spending anywhere from 30 minutes to 2 hours on hold, just to get through to a csp and not get any results....this has been very, very frustrating as I am sure you can imagine.  Now the biggest question is, do these new tablets and the new director page communicate with FedEx Ground????

Review.Titre: I've been trying to contact them for…
Review.Contenu: I've been trying to contact them for months and they are now on their 4th or 5th rep for our area, but still completely lacking in forthcoming information. Going to cancel our account and move to an alternate tracking provider

Review.Titre: Dont support this business
Review.Contenu: I am the owner of a Wedding Car company called Direct Wedding Cars LTD. I have trackers installed in four of my vehicles.As we all know we are in a pandemic and all large gatherings including Weddings have been cancelled.So after asking Teletrac Navman for a payment holiday or some help with the issue, they have finally come back to me.They have given me 2 options. I either pay the outstanding bills (which I have explained, we have no money in the business as we haven't had a inwards payment for 4 months) orOption 2 - they will be taking me to court for the payment.I wouldnt support this business by giving them your trade, as they will not support you when you need them.RegardsDal Badial

Review.Titre: Without notice no tracking for 6 devices
Review.Contenu: Without notice, my tracking for 6 devices was inactive for 16 days during my peak construction season in which we work 6 days per week. 98% of the tracking we rely on the app for truck scheduling in the field. After 4 phone calls and one misdiagnosis, the tracking was back up and running and was told, only after I asked, it may have been a billing error. No apology or motion to try to make it right. My small business severely suffered during those 2 weeks and my invoicing in turn is delayed without the ability to check reports.However, I have been with Teletrac for several years with no issues other than shotty installations by local subcontractors of Teletrac that were corrected.

Review.Titre: Been on the orientation for 3 hours to…
Review.Contenu: Been on the orientation for 3 hours to speak to the satnav team been first in the queue for 2 hours absolutely appalling waste of time. In the end terminated the call

Review.Titre: Doubled Disappointment
Review.Contenu: I recently wrote a review for very poor service and lack of responses to numerous calls for help to take over the account for the Teletrac Navman connected to my vehicle. Having written the poor review I was contacted with promises to follow up and ensure that i would be connected and that I would be registered as a user with full connection and support. I was informed that I would be contacted after giving details for registration for the sixth time. True to experience so far with this company there has been NO reconnection and NO follow up contact from the company representative. Disappointed is an understatement for the integrity of the company if the apologies and promises are not a true and genuine attempt to remedy a customers request for service.

Review.Titre: Worst customer service we have ever …
Review.Contenu: Worst customer service we have ever experienced. They were extremely helpful with making false promises and getting us to sign a contract on 19 units almost a month ago. We were told they would be shipped out within 4-5 days. 7 days later, no units had arrived. We have been calling everyday to get an update on our order for  2 weeks now and cannot get ahold of anyone on the sales team that made the order, because according to their customer service team- those sales people that helped us are the only ones who can check status of our order. Hopefully something happens soon, otherwise we will be screwed for this ELD mandate that starts in 2 weeks. I would highly recommend NOT using this company.

Review.Titre: lost the trucks on my computer and…
Review.Contenu: lost the trucks on my computer and could not track them, after getting it settled, now I can only see a handful ?

Review.Titre: Account Managers never get back to you and the online shop clearly doesn't work
Review.Contenu: We have been a customer of Teletrac Navman for several years and have just purchased a new van which needs a tracker fitting. I used the online shop in our account to request one and it advised our account handler would be in touch, this was over 2 weeks ago. This week I called customer services who said there was nothing on their system they emailed Bobby who apparently is our account manager, I have not heard this name before. Still not heard anything so yesterday requested it again on the online shop and still nothing.Would not recommend using them and we will not be once our current contract ends, we want to give them money with a new tracker and they still cannot be bothered getting in touch

Review.Titre: Not entirely convinced at the service.
Review.Contenu: Not entirely convinced at the service.Was originally with another well known tracker service with my old car but offered this via BMW and the pricing was good.- Support is often painful to get through to, long waits- The blue fobs constantly break and need replacing (never needed one replacing with the previous company)- Car often shows in a location where it isn't on the app. Right now it shows somewhere it hasn't been for days. - App is awful. Can't view a single journey overall, you have to watch a stupid replay of the journey instead and then it just stops - not very useful at all. - Suffering with the above, then you're not allowed to login and view the journey becuase they tell you to use the app.I'll certainly not be getting another one and will go back to the previous supplier, who had their own issues but certainly the product and app were far more reliable.**Despite the "we'll be in touch". They were never in touch.

Review.Titre: We have never had all units working at…
Review.Contenu: We have never had all units working at one time. Half of the time the people we call do not know how to fix the issues. Issues may get fixed but then something else will go wrong. Issues with ELD, tracking, screens going blank, and truck/trailer reporting. We are literally paying for something that may or may not work with no compensation for these issues. We have actually been charged for repairs on the units that we have when they are no fault of our own. Not to mention we are stuck in a contract with this.

Review.Titre: Six months after buying vehicle and…
Review.Contenu: Six months after buying vehicle and using the service the unit snapped off. As we had found that the teletrac services were't relevant for our business I emailed the company to exit the contract. It took them about 4 months to eventually answer my question. They said that I had entered into a 3 year contact and so I was stuck with the expense for the next 2 years. I had not been made aware that it was a three year contract when signing up. Nor was there any early exit process in place so BEWARE

Review.Titre: If my first experience with Teletrac…
Review.Contenu: If my first experience with Teletrac had been today, I would have given them 5 stars because the support person I had today (Sam) was excellent!!!  Unfortunately, the past experiences (and there have been many the past two weeks) the support service of Teletrac was horrible.  No responses to emails, no calls back when I have left messages, etc.

Review.Titre: they always give you the run around
Review.Contenu: they always give you the run around, i have been trying for months now to return gps that are not being used, but keep getting charged for! all they tell me is to email some email and they open a case! what for? its stupid. we just want to ship unused gps back to them and for them not to charge us anymore...how complicated is that!!!

Review.Titre: Poor Install, Frustrating No reply accounts
Review.Contenu: Install had to take place over 2 different weekends, lots of parts missing from the first install. Difficult to get all vehicles back on site. Paid a lot of money upfront and still no reply from the ignorant people in the accounts section, still waiting for copy paperwork for all the monies we have paid. No reply after several attempts. Sales as usual got the sale now not interested

Review.Titre: The tech who finally solved this deserves 5 stars..
Review.Contenu: The two stars is because I am disappointed that this was not resolved with my first call; the first technician clearly is new to support and the product itself.Mario Rodriguez deserves 5 stars and all of the credit - he resolved my problem quickly and efficiently.

Review.Titre: unimpressed
Review.Contenu: Was excited to try a new system but have thus far been disappointed with quality of service & features. Tablets are 3 inch, making messages hard to read. Can only save 20 favorites, not the system I would recommend for companies servicing the same addresses. have experienced a lot of down time were units are not registering. notifications for service intervals don't seem to work. looking for a different service

Review.Titre: It all sounded so promising.
Review.Contenu: We are a new customer to Navman, fitting it into 51 HGV vehicles. Difficult fitting agent, but we got there in the end.The system has failed us several times now and is offline as we speak, and has been for several hours. Navman just blame the Vodafone network which isn't much good when you've got vehicles sat waiting. The helpline just seem to say 'its not our fault'.If only they could get the thing worked properly it would be great.

Review.Titre: QUICK TURN AROUND TO INSTALL
Review.Contenu: QUICK TURN AROUND TO INSTALL. SALES REP WAS VERY HELPFUL. HOWEVER THERE HAS BEEN 2 ISSUES THAT I CALLED IN AND RECEIVED CASE NUMBER, NO CALL BACKS. CUSTOMER SERVICE TOLD ME IT COULD BE MONTHS ON A UNIT THAT DOES NOT WORK. I NEED TO RUN THE TRUCK. POSSIBLY THE WORSE CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER. I GAVE THE STARS TO SALES.

Review.Titre: No response by email at all. Gave up trying to call too.
Review.Contenu: We have had this this system for about 5 years now. The email response is non existent. We have had issues downloading it to a new computer and trying to get help as proved fruitless. We do not even know who our account manager is so next week we have arranged someone else to come in and give us  a quote.

Review.Titre: When it takes over 30 minutes on hold…
Review.Contenu: When it takes over 30 minutes on hold to get a hold of a company that is pathetic customer service....  Now I have a unit that is not working properly and the Metro Mobile people say they can't come out and fix it until the middle of January???  How is that possible....

Review.Titre: Poor Customer Service
Review.Contenu: Hopefully somebody from Teletrac Navman will see this and come back to me about the accounts queries I have raised with a so called account manager in addition to the 3 e-mails I have sent and the person in accounts I spoke to on Tuesday who said somebody would call me back. That was 2 days ago and still waiting - on verge of pulling plug and moving to another supplier. Customer service has gone south since they decided, like most organisations these days, that its cheaper to run everything through the website than deal with your customers in person.

Review.Titre: It can take a while to get the correct …
Review.Contenu: It can take a while to get the correct data and then to print out past logs. It only works with Internet Explorer on our computers. The quicker view does not print easily and is sometimes missing crucial information such as: vehicle was stopped for 45 minutes, driving for an hour and 15 minutes etc.

Review.Titre: Automatic renewal beware!
Review.Contenu: I wanted to move the couple of vehicles that I had with teletrac to a much more efficient system we are using with Quartix.  I have just been informed that they have an automatic renewal policy and that they want a fee per vehicle to release me from the contract.  I had negotiated a 12 month deal as I had said that I didn't want to be tied in for 2 years.  At no time was it mentioned that renewal was automatic and no notice of pending renewal is given to their customers.  I will make sure that I don't use them again.

Review.Titre: I like the old system better, except the part where I was always losing signal, right when I needed it.
Review.Contenu: I like the old system better.  This one requires you to be (not driving ) to goto Where to?  to view a message.,  to check a log for time , or  location.  I don't stop therefore I don't use.  EDLs do nothing to improve safety, they actually do just the opposite  by forcing drivers to, "race against the machine."  (This includes speeding in construction zones, tailgating left lane cruisers, passing on the right,  running stop signs, and more)  I wish they'd just let drivers use "common sense" like they do in Europe.  I guess American drivers are too stupid, and don't really care .

Review.Titre: Reliability is job one
Review.Contenu: Reliability is job one, too many devices not working in our fleet. Too much time working on said devices. Too many phone calls, and too much time holding on the phone to discuss problems. Granted our devices are three years old, but they've always been unreliable.

Review.Titre: We've had and are still having so many…
Review.Contenu: We've had and are still having so many issues that it's hard for me to keep up with the problems and driver errors. We really need technical support that can fix the issues and not have me as an individual with 10+ trucks trying to fix your problems.

Review.Titre: I have been dealing with tech support…
Review.Contenu: I have been dealing with tech support for more than six months obviously your short on staff and or the product is just not performing the way it was presented. On a scale 1-10 I’m at 3-4 and ready to try another company

Review.Titre: Not happy with the service
Review.Contenu: Not happy with the service.  There are a lot of issues with communication with the tablets. Drivers should not have to spend so much time on the phone with the service department to get their tablets functioning properly.  Our office and drivers have spent many hours trying to fix the systems and the technical staff are never on the same page. It should not take 24 to 48 hours to receive advice. If Teletrac really knew what it was like being a truck driver on a time limit for a day they would do a better job servicing them or developing a better system so they wouldn't have to go onto paper logs every other day.  It really is ridiculous!

Review.Titre: If you want anything done make sure you call them.
Review.Contenu: The customer service I received over the phone was great, but this was only after I called them. I put in a ticket for a tablet problem back in September and a ticket for a problem running reports in November but never received and response back.

Review.Titre: Serigo does a great job in trying to…
Review.Contenu: Serigo does a great job in trying to help. He is very professional and knowledgeable. However; he does not have much to work with as the equipment is old school and very problematic. Modern technology has left this system behind.

Review.Titre: I was switching from one fleet name to…
Review.Contenu: I was switching from one fleet name to another fleet name. This took several week to get set up. My ELD were not working for that amount of time. I don't think this shou;d have been as difficult as it was.

Review.Titre: The only reason I gave two stars …
Review.Contenu: The only reason I gave two stars instead of one is because the Teletrac support team has never been rude. I would NOT recommend this ELD system. When it works, it's fine, but if it goes down, good luck at getting technical help. One of our units has been acting up for over two months. Technician has been out twice, still actiing up. I've called technical support on three occasions, had to wait in excess of 20 minutes to have someone tell me they have made a case # and will call me back. Have not had ONE call back yet. If it were in my power, I would run away from this incompetent company as fast and as far as I could. The only thing they've done for me is get my blood pressure raised.

Review.Titre: We have had 5 tablets and fleet…
Review.Contenu: We have had 5 tablets and fleet director in service for 2 years and the system has served its purpose. In January I had 2 more units installed. The tablets have not been able to connect to the units since day one (they don't show up in the Bluetooth list on the tablet). I have entered multiple tickets and made many phone calls with no resolve. Today I did reach a representative George who really was trying to help by having me install an update. Thinking this fixed the problem the ticket was closed. I am back to square one with 2 trucks that are running interstate illegally because they won't connect AND I have been paying for these since installation. All I want is for them to fix this issue before we get a DOT stop!

Review.Titre: for our customer service helper Karla…
Review.Contenu: for our customer service helper Karla L. I give her 5 starsbut for the total over all rating is a 2the system is constantly crashingthe contract and value of the system is not worth the $

Review.Titre: This work order took two visit for…
Review.Contenu: This work order took two visit for installation, I always use this tech, they are great. But going thru Teletrac to update the work order so they could come back took some time.

Review.Titre: The first line of support doesn't seem…
Review.Contenu: The first line of support doesn't seem to be able to think outside of the box, one solution for each problem. The software as well as the hardware seems to be riddled with problems. The TM480's don't seem to track properly, I believe that is due to the antenna being built into the black box and placement could also effect this as the TM470 had an antenna that stuck to the bottom of the dash board. Resolving issues takes way too long. There are many many great people at Teletrac that I feel are victims of circumstances. They had no part in building the software or hardware but continually have to deal with unhappy customers trying to solve problem that won't seem to go away. One scary issue is the Promiles for IFTA taxes, the Promiles platform seems to be solid but the information downloading into it from Teletrac has some serious issues.

Review.Titre: The tech support guy I talked to…
Review.Contenu: The tech support guy I talked to yesterday wanted just to talk and not listen to my problem. It was annoying and I hung up on him. I still dont have my unit fixed

Review.Titre: We have had so many issues with these …
Review.Contenu: We have had so many issues with these ELD we have called the help center they couldn't help me they told me they had to submitted a ticket and someone would call me back. I have submitted 3 tickets since Dec 15,2017 and still have not received a response. Logs keep going into violation. Truck was in the shop for three days driver was off the last 5 days. When the driver logged in today his ELD in the truck is in red status after driving 4 hours today. You can't  call to ask for help. They will tell you they have an over whelming amount of calls, no idea when they can have someone call you back. They will submit a new ticket.The rep that sold us the ELD's was outstanding. The service to get  them installed was very quick and friendly.The Rep handling the upgrade installation was great. You will just have to run with malfunctioning ELD if you have a problem. You have to figure out how to set them up.

Review.Titre: Poor customer/after service
Review.Contenu: Having been a customer for about 10 years, I was originally happy with the product & the tracking, but something has drastically changed. When we last had a problem with one of the brackets on a tracker, it took nearly 8 weeks before we were sent a new one (which meant we were without a tracker for all that time).Now we find that the location shown on line is about 10/15 minutes a drift from where you think your drivers actually are. The maps are also outdated on the system & often show you driving through fields or roads that don't exist. My drivers are constantly complaining about how bad the systems are to navigate you anywhere.I sent in a complaint asking for someone to contact me regarding my problems, and received an email back saying my account manager would contact me.... he never did.Now I have received another email saying my complaint is now resolved & closed!!!All I now what to know is how I can get out of this contract, so that we can move to a different company?

Review.Titre: can't seem to get a return phone call…

Review.Titre: Have to take specialize training to do…
Review.Contenu: Have to take specialize training to do simple tasks.  Relates mileage in km guess what we are not in Canada.

Review.Titre: Poor Service
Review.Contenu: As a Company i find Navman very poor.  Their customer service is terrible and they are overpriced for the goods.

Review.Pseudo: Gabriel Graciano - Safety Manager- Lizama Carriers
Review.Titre: Many bugs all over, very cheatable.
Review.Contenu: Many bugs all over. A very cheatable system, you only need to remove the Garmin tablet from the mount and the status will be frozen, and even if they see the "MDT Offline" (they call it like that when the tablet is removed from the magnetic mount) they are unable to say if the driver did it or not (Case#00371323: "Driver stuck on driving"). After many years with this company, you have to see each driver logs to see if the driver used Personal Conveyance or Adverse driver condition in the wrong way to drive more, there's no way to see it in a report of any kind. No automatic yard move, like Onmitrac that have a geofence on your yard and all movement at your yard never trigger a driving status nor unassigned drive time. If the system gets jammed sometimes don't even report logs of any kind during the malfunction allowing the driver to drive more, very bad for safety.Tier one of Support, half of them will never see a Violation if is not showed as a Violation on their screen, no knowledge of HOS rules at all, great customer service but undertrained. I can remember many awesome guys in Tier 1, but they always have to make you wait until they ask your question to the Tier2. Tier 2 is very hard to find.

Review.Titre: You are expected to pay for repairs to Teletrac Equipment after 1 year
Review.Contenu: Have 6 vans with Teletrac for about 18 months. have had issues with 2 of the trackers in that time. first issue took 3 engineers visits but was eventually repaired. A couple of weeks ago another tracker developed the same fault (ignition showing as off as vehicle is moving). I call up to arrange an engineer visit and am told that as the unit it over a year old I have to pay to fix their faulty equipment!?!I did not choose the equipment (and we haven't damaged it either) they supplied to provide the service I pay a monthly fee for and judging by the 33% failure rate I have experienced over the last 18 months these trackers were chosen on a cost rather than a reliability basis. I really cannot fathom the short sighted policy of a service company that expects their monthly paying customers to pay for the repair of equipment essential to the supply of their service. You would think a professional customer focused company would factor in any potential breakdown costs into their monthly service charge, but guess not.Customer service isn't bad its just really short staffed (I think another poorly thought out money saving measure)  and waiting 2-3 days for a reply to an email or a request to be actioned is not unusual.

Review.Titre: Poor Response time
Review.Contenu: Waiting on the 'credit' issue to be resolved.  No one seems to be getting back with me.

Review.Titre: Having connectivity issues
Review.Contenu: Having connectivity issues, hardware issues, software or firmware issues offen.

Review.Titre: My last experience was better ,but only…
Review.Contenu: My last experience was better ,but only because it was a simple fix.

Review.Titre: I have been waiting over a month for…
Review.Contenu: Read update after initial review here. I have updated from a 1 star to a 2 star. I have been waiting over a month for them to fix issues with my eld units. I still have not received the parts needed. They keep telling me they are reprogramming my units to work. They assigned a new troubleshooter to me to help me resolve the issues. He just forwards my complaints to tech support who don't ever seem to get them fixed. I had 2 other bad reviews on her but navman got them removed as they don't want to fix the issues but they don't want anyone to know about it either. I am fighting the removal of the other 2 reviews. They asked for my account number which you put in the form at the bottom of the page. Their excuse for removal was they didn't know the account number. LOOK AT THE BOTTOM OF THE FORM NAVMAN. IT IS THERE ON EVERY REVIEW I WRITE FOR YOU TO SEE. I speak with your tech support line on a daily basis and they have no issue finding my phone number to return calls later in the day so if you are truly interested in contacting me please refer to my account number and dial the phone number listed for me. thanks.Update:My fixer Jeff finally got deeper involved. He totally agreed with me that my experience here is not acceptable. He did get tier 2 management involved and they have so far sent 2 of the 4 parts needed to fix my trucks. Still waiting on the other to to be sent. Nothing has arrived but I can see the shipping info on the first 2. Jeff is recommending that tier 2 be required to contact the customer before sidelining a suggested repair from tier 1 tech support. As it stands now tier 2 doesn't agree with the diagnosis they just cancel the case. This is where most of the problems of long delay occur.

Review.Titre: The software is not user friendly
Wasted 5 months of my life....
Review.Contenu: I came in blind eyed to a company who had the teletrac system for tracking their vans, it all seemed well until I contacted them to cancel a tracker on one of our vans, ( we have 4 trackers in total) 2 x dating back to contract 2014 2 x dating from 2018 /2017 5 months or about,  it took me to speak to someone who knew what they were talking about! Repetitive back and fourth emails waiting for replies, useless staff,  receiving “if you don’t reply in 3 days we will cancel your ticket “ when I was still waiting for a reply.... The first man I spoke to was no help at all, he  told me we couldn’t pause/ stop the tracker ( which 5 months later I found out I could )he informed me that we were on one year contract that I believed to nearly be up for renewal....   he never got back to me and I again had to contact teletrac and open another ticket! The second man was no help again.I got no where and was still paying for a van that was off the road. I believe we have payed for 6 months worth of tracker that was sitting in an unused van ? I gave up with him in the end :( I then spoke to a woman who was much more helpful, however we didn’t get anywhere. I explained what had happen to which she apologised, and managed to cancel the tracker for us FINALY !!!! I also asked her to cancel another tracker, which she did!             ( these are for 90 day rolling trackers ) I then asked to see the original contract as I had just about had enough of the company and wanted to leave ASAP ! I found out that we were In a 5 year contract ?!?!? SERIOUSLY!!! I received the contract and it was signed in 2017... which meant one more year, I was so relieved! I was then told this was a MISTAKE ?!?! and they had made an error on the contract  ?!? They gave me a price to cancel the tracker with a £20 discount .... I just left the email conversation as I had had enough. I canceled our direct debit and emailed no more. For a company that we have been with since 2014 I am shocked at the service and lack of help! I would have thought with the times wasted  we have encountered, they would have honoured the cancelation of contract and apologised profusely! I am genuinely disgusted and wait to hear from them when they don’t receive their payment ( for unused trackers ) I am truly saddened that a world wide company only care about money and not their customers- especially loyal ones.

We paid Teletrac for the cables and are doing the install our selves there is no reason why I should have to call to get them functional. I paid for them to be functional.

Review.Titre: Could be better, I expected more

Review.Titre: Frustrating
Review.Contenu: This was a very frustration process for this issue. It required more phone calls than typical. The case number changed many times. My hold time on the phone was also more than normal after the call was answered. Different associated seemed to be running the same reports and telling me to try the same problem resolution steps. I recognize when the trouble is beyond some of the typical issues. There seemed to be a rush to close the case when the unit functioned for short periods of time. There seemed to be some trying to convince me the unit was operating normally when the driver activity was not posting correctly. Glad it is done at this point.

Myself and Duncan worked together with Suzanne to arrange all installation dates. On the whole the process did pick up speed but we did have a couple of appointments which were missed due to the engineers partner being taken poorly (no communication received) Suzanne has been very accommodating when we needed to amend location of appointments etc.

Review.Contenu: The GPS system works fine, but the customer service is lacking. I have spent time and money bringing in trucks for diagnostic for repairs, not to mention my own time on the phone and did not receive calls when promised. At the end of the whole ordeal I was told that the entire fleet needed to be sent updated software but that wasn't the department of the person I was speaking to so I would have to call in if my fleet experienced issues. I had to press them to update our entire fleet's software. Why is that? Shouldn't software be updated automatically if needed? Or if they see that 4 trucks aren't working properly shouldn't they opt to update the whole fleet? Very annoying and lacking in customer service. One tech named Mario actually called me back and helped with my issue to that is why there is even 3 stars here.

Review.Contenu: Before signing in a contract, the company was very attentive and responsive. Upon signing, we had to wait for the equipment for 2 weeks. Out of the 13 units, 2 were wrong and I had to ship back. It has been 6 weeks and countless phone calls and we are still waiting for those units. I am blind to the where about of my trucks. What if the ELD law was in effect? My trucks would have been down this whole time? What if your phone would brake and 6 weeks later your carrier wouldn't be able to provide you with a replacement? Update:I managed to reach several people in managerial position. It look like they solve this problem in a matter of a day. In all honesty, all the people in this company I spoke with striked me as good, intelligent and caring about their brand. I don't know where was the break in communication, and I believe it is not acceptable. I also know most people are only taking the time to write review when they are upset and not when all is going smoothly. I hope this will get better.

Review.Titre: Poor Service
Review.Contenu: We signed up with Teletrac 3 years ago.  Since 2014 we have had an issue with online reports.  Come to find out that there is a "work around" hmm.  You would think that the technical team would know this.  Instead, I would get an email from the technical team once in a while telling me that they were "still working on it but had no resolution."  Frustrated with the poor service and needing a better system I shopped around.NOTE : After the initial 3 year contract Teletrac renews!  You need to be careful to cancel before that happens.  Not what the sales person told me but hey it's in the small print, right!  I attempted to cancel my account before the actual renewal date (not within their time though) because there are cheaper, friendlier programs out there, that are much easier to use with exceedingly better service.  The would not cancel my account since I had not contacted them 90 days prior.  Sent 4 emails and left messages with several different people early in January.  It took them more than a week to return my emails and calls.  If you are a small business like me, do not hire these people   They are only interested in your money, not in providing you with good service.  I will wait until my term expires and cancel.  Don't get caught like I did!Update 04/14/17:After this review, they did cancel my account yay!  I have been pleased with the service I got from their retention department.  So for that reason I'm changing my 2 star rating to 3.
