Review.Titre: Still needs work the ELD that is!!
Took to long to get system updated
Telectrac not working correctly
SYSTEM FAILED TO WORK NOW BEING SUED FOR $3000.00
Review.Contenu: We had three tablets installed on 9/3/2015. On 9/15/16 I sent an email to Norman informing him the system does NOT perform as promised. The “salesman” was well aware of the prior system we had been using (Nextraq) and he stated TeleTrac would do the same thing for less money each month. The TeleTrac system does NOT provide the same service. Norman replied saying he would send this matter to the “implementation team”.  I called Norman numerous times thereafter to ask about the software being adapted so the system would perform as promised by TeleTrac’s agent.  I finally received a telephone call the beginning of 2016 from the software development department informing me they could not write a program that would fulfill my needs as set forth in my 9/15/15 email to Norman – they breached of the lease. On 11/20/15 I sent an email stating two of the tablets had quit working. I received an email 11/23/15 stating the firmware would be updated. This did not work so new tablets were sent out and received on 12/3/15. On 12/4/15 I sent an email informing TeleTrac that the tablets still did not work and requested the contract be canceled due to non-performance and a credit for the months we hadn’t been able to use the system but had paid anyway.  Jan agreed to credit our account which was never done. On 12/9/15 we received replacement chargers but these didn’t work either.  I sent another email on 12/17/15 once again asking for a credit as that was never done.  Finally, on 2/12/16 I sent another email saying the one tablet was once again not working (the other one never worked). My small, family owned plumbing company has paid a total of $698.05 for one tablet that worked for maybe four months (the other tablet NEVER worked) with no credit given.  TeleTrac’s Subscriber Agreement sets forth we are being charged for use of their “data, software and added value options”. We have NOT used any of TeleTrac’s software since February 2016 and we will not pay for something we are not and cannot use.  I believe the $698.05 is overpayment for a system that didn’t work and the software was misrepresented to me as it did not fulfill our needs. Now Teletrac is threatening to sue my business (I'm a woman) that I own with my son for $3,000.00!!UPDATE: This review prompted Teletrac Navman to contact me. They zeroed out our account and even refunded the company all of the money we had been charged. He explained they had hired new management to work out the issues with the hardware and system and apologized for everything we had gone through.

Review.Titre: Cesar addressed the issue quickly

Review.Titre: False U-Turn
Review.Contenu: Video had been created showing a U-Turn when it was only a sharp curve in the road, this was a False Positive. Teletrac was able to set up a Geo Fence to keep the system from producing another event. I would like to have the ability to create my own Geo fence to have better controls, the reason for 4 star.

Review.Titre: THE NEW SETUP WITH CHECKING ON CUSTOMER…
Review.Contenu: THE NEW SETUP WITH CHECKING ON CUSTOMER AND DOUBLE CHECKING ABOUT APPOINTMENT IS GREAT. STILL NEED HELP IN THE BEING ABLE TO TALK WITH YOUR ACCOUNT REP TO FIND OUT INFORMATION

Review.Titre: Cesar F is great
Review.Contenu: Cesar F is great! Very helpful and patient! I do have issue with the Teletrac Navman as a whole. They lack the organizational skills to make the process from purchasing to using seamless. They need to work on assigning a representative to walk customers from the purchase to installation to onboarding then training.

Review.Titre: I became an admin!
Review.Contenu: I needed to become an admin, not just a driver. I called in the morning to set it up, but I was missing some features. I called again in the afternoon and was able to get the problem fixed. I needed a whole new account, but it seems to be working fine now.

Review.Titre: Jose was very helpful getting one of…
Review.Contenu: Jose was very helpful getting one of our trucks to show back up the administrative side after upgrade to 4G took place

Review.Titre: We did all we can do
Review.Contenu: We did all we can do. It is a software problem on the back end. I been doing this for 8 years. Platinum was helpful. Navman is working on a fix.

Review.Titre: Service Rep was very helpful
Review.Contenu: Cesar was very helpful, and I appreciated him calling back to confirm our unit was up and running.

Review.Titre: Be able to solve my problems
Review.Contenu: Be able to solve my problems. The quick follow and customer service. Cesar did a great job.

Review.Titre: Support was very helpful
Review.Contenu: Support was very helpful, just wish it didn't take 5 days for them to call.  But once they did, we got unit up and running.

Review.Titre: We are on our 4th GPS but the team has…
Review.Contenu: We are on our 4th GPS but the team has been quick to try & fix our problem. Hopefully this last one was the charm.

Review.Titre: Had to be on hold for a few
Review.Contenu: Had to be on hold for a few.  Than got a guy said wasn’t the right number. But he transferred me to someone that helped me the number we had it is fixed now

Review.Titre: The service desk works hard to make…
Review.Contenu: The service desk works hard to make everything right for the customer.

Review.Titre: Bus driver for Holiday motor coach new…
Review.Contenu: Bus driver for Holiday motor coach new device was installed on11-10-21. On 11-11 still not working I called it in and agent tracked it while I was still driving and got it working. Then called me back when he noticed I was off duty. Thanks for the help. I just talked with Jose and still having a issue with engine dionostics being in the red and communicating

Review.Titre: Teletrac has worked good for us for the…
Review.Contenu: Teletrac has worked good for us for the most part. The customer service people has always been curtius when we have issues with the products and programs.I believe that the staff could be a bit more knolledgable about some issues such as drivers log issues and being more informative to the drivers when a log issue accures.

Review.Titre: The technicians I deal with registering…
Review.Contenu: The technicians I deal with registering new devices are great,the quality of the cables in the kits we receive to install is poor at best.I cannot figure why your company cannot make these units work out of the box with no modifications!

Review.Titre: I had two requests in for assistance at…
Review.Contenu: I had two requests in for assistance at the same time and was very pleased my call was taken right away and my question answered in one call.  Customer Service has improved drastically since last year.  My second request is still pending but is being addressed and I have been kept in the loop.  Keep up the good work, you have no idea how much it is appreciated!

Review.Titre: Mario was very helpful today
Review.Contenu: Mario was very helpful today.  I had very little information on the original malfunction with the tablet.  He did all the research and let me know what the driver had called on in April. We had just gotten the truck back from the shop and I had misplaced my notes from the original calls. He then went through all the checks on the system and made sure that it was operating correctly.

Review.Titre: I would suggest a more customer…
Review.Contenu: I would suggest a more customer centered approach to Customer service that gives specific group of agents that would handle the calls from a limited group of customers.  So that you would get to know the customers and their specific needs and not so many handlers that are not as familiar. Perhaps it would be less confusing with so many Case #'s. However, I do get problems resolved most of the time.

Review.Titre: Work Around for Co-Driver 30 min Break on Federal
Review.Contenu: There is a work around for the issue I reported about the 30 min break for co drivers, but in my opinion, the company should have thought about the issue before instituting the programming.  Perhaps they will have a fix that will be in an upgrade in the future.  The associate was able to answer my question, and gave me the work around that I had asked the drivers to complete already.

Review.Titre: Customer Success Team
Review.Contenu: I have now worked with Alexandra for the past year and found her to be very efficient  and professional in her work and customer service. On occasions she can become very frustrated by the internal teams failure to understand what the customer requires as was evident with the recent install programme but once alexandra got involved the issue was sorted to our satisfaction.

Review.Titre: Navman were being used by the company I…
Review.Contenu: Navman were being used by the company I work for long before I joined and since working with them I can see why! They have proven to be reliable, professional and have regularly helped where they can to achieve fleet compliance. Alexandra Mooney is our Customer Success Specialist and is always happy to help with any queries and issues that we have faced. Fab all round!

Review.Titre: My current experience with Teletrac…
Review.Contenu: My current experience with Teletrac Navman, in particular Ben, was a breath if fresh air compared to my numerous experiences with Teletrac. Ben was very attentive to our current situation and was also very helpful in recognising my previous frustrations in dealing with Teletrac.Ben has certainly eased any trepidation I may have in dealing with Teletrac in the future.

Review.Titre: Working with CS Reps.
Review.Contenu: I have been working with several of your CS Reps, 50% of your Reps are very good and helpful, the other half will hang up on you, if they can don't know how to fix or we will hear your problem is a quick fix to tell us or the drivers to go to paper logs with out checking what is wrong and maybe able to fix it. another problem is that some of my driver ask to be talk to in Spanish yet the CS reps talk to them in English and the drivers gets upset and hangs up the phone, I've been in several calls with this problem and the CS Reps don't give there name.

Review.Titre: Over the last 2 years we've had…
Review.Contenu: Over the last 2 years we've had Teletrac Navman I've had to call customer support on numerous occasions.  On this occasion, the technician was quite knowledgeable and helpful and, not only did he solve the issues I was having, he went above and beyond to provide me with some tools to help what I was trying to do.

Review.Titre: Our issue was addressed and handled to…
Review.Contenu: Our issue was addressed and handled to our satisfaction, however we are not clear on how the issued happened and don't have a clear answer.  Also, at first the gentleman who helped me got defensive and I then let him speak with Peter, who is the person who implemented the system and then things were handled much better.

Review.Titre: Thank you
Review.Contenu: Their customer service is personally the best I've seen from any company. They are helpful and extremely patient with the needs demanded from our fleet units. While their product has reoccurring issues they always ready to work with us to correct any technical errors.

Review.Titre: Very good troubleshooting
Review.Contenu: Overall I have great experiences with Teletrac. Most agents are very thorough and cordial. They seem to know that, as a Ryder employee, I have little time to spend on the phone and they take care of issues promptly! Those few times where there was more troubleshooting needed, theres no hesitation to stay and help!

Review.Titre: Vehicle Nuber Needed In Teletrac Navman
Review.Contenu: I needed help with placing a Number of the Vehicle in Teletrac Navman.  The Customer Service Rep was very helpful showing me how to complete my task.  It was a little concerning for me because the Customer Service Rep was a bit hard to understand do to the accent however after a bit back and forth everything worked out.

Review.Titre: Good Service
Review.Contenu: We had an issue with a vehicle not able to log in the driver.Customer support tried to resolve the issue but were unable to and transferred me to a Tier 2 person. This person was able to help me in less than 5 minutes.Would only suggest that initial customer support would have transferred me earlier in the week.Thank you

Review.Titre: I appreciate the technicians candor…
Review.Contenu: I appreciate the technicians candor while he was on site.  However, he took quite a long time to repair what he called "simple" issues.  He stated that the units were swapped and not installed properly.  However, all trucks were installed the same way, by the same individual, and only 4 out of 13 trucks had issues.  He was able to get them fixed.  I received no paperwork on this while the technician was on site.  I would really like a full understanding of what happened if I am being billed for this repair.

Review.Titre: We have been using Teletrac for several…
Review.Contenu: We have been using Teletrac for several years now. Initially they had some issues with getting support on downed devices but have really started turning things around. They were able to help me relatively quickly and was able to get the case resolved. BIG turn around for the company in terms of support and assistance.

Review.Titre: At one time we were at the point of…
Review.Contenu: At one time we were at the point of researching other ELD providers because of Teletrac's poor technical assistance and hardware problems. That has improved immensely and we have recently added solar trackers to our fleet. Please keep working on your customer support. It has greatly improved and we thank you for that. Look forward to increasing our fleet and partnership with Teletrac. I just had a good experience with Cesar Franco. He gave me excellent response, fixed my problem, even called me back when the connection went bad. Give him some recognition for great service. Thanks

Review.Titre: Mario rocks
Review.Contenu: Mario rocks, always room for improvement but you can't get much better.  He is always helpful, polite and goes above and beyond. I have worked with him several times and look forward to get his service in the future.  He needs a raise or promoted. He would be a good canidate to train others.

Review.Titre: No connection to VLU-solved
Review.Contenu: No connection to VLU-solvedGabriel had knowledge on what he was doing and put us back on the road. One of our drivers complain about no connection with VLU so Gabriel solved the situation very well and we learned for future similar troubles how to request assistance: TBTprofileThank you,Tere Sanchez

Review.Titre: Speaking with a customer support team…
Review.Contenu: Speaking with a customer support team member helped me find exactly what I was looking for. The only reason not to give 5 stars is the long hold time when calling customer support. We are always put on hold and must wait 30 - 60 minutes.

Review.Titre: the tech was efficient but disappointed…
Review.Contenu: the tech was efficient but disappointed with Teletrac for not contacting us to let us know of the problem with the update that had our trucks not communicating.  There should have been some notification to us not waiting for us to contact you to get things resolved.

Review.Titre: We have been having a lot of issues…
Review.Contenu: We have been having a lot of issues with the Teletrac systems and the basic level of tech support did not meet my needs at all and after several calls and emails to the sales representative the advance tech support department got involved and was able correct all the issues. Basic tech support has to better trained there phone system has to upgraded(always a bad connection and back round noise during the call) and same day response as supposed to days later is a must. As I have said before the product is great when its working but when its not best to have excellent support!

Review.Titre: Customer support today was very good
Review.Contenu: Customer support today was very good, the reason for 4 stars is the fact that I was sent updated devices to put in our trucks that would not work properly. After a quick phone call to Teletrac I was informed we needed to preform an update on the updated devices.

Review.Titre: The person who was helping me with my…
Review.Contenu: The person who was helping me with my problem was professional and patient, working through each troubleshooting point until the problem was diagnosed. I wish I didn't have to be on the phone for an hour, but I don't think it could have been helped either.
1052025. keep watch on this to make sure it was tracking. So far so good.

Review.Titre: Hardware sent overnight
Review.Contenu: Hardware sent overnight, perfect!Install sub contractors are delayed 4-5 days for install.I know Covid has played a part in this, but it always seems there is a delay in install.  Wish there wasn't.SubContractors do excellent work.

Review.Titre: Your support department needs help overall…
Review.Contenu: The gentleman I spoke to when I called tech support was able to help me. He seemed professional and curteous. However, I could only hear every other word. His phone continued cutting out the entire call. Not sure what the phone issue was. He took care of me though, after your support team yesterday messed up our vehicle reporting and I couldn't get a prompt reply back from my emails this morning I finally got fed up and I had no choice but to call tech support, which I hate having to do. We have not had good experiences lately with teletrac customer service with the exception of a few people who I have mentioned in reviews. This gentleman today was good, he was helpful, but needs to get better phone reception.

Review.Titre: I don't understand why we had this problem
Review.Contenu: I don't understand why we had this issue. Service center switched from HOS to ELD on the Elog. Called us and asked us to add new profiles for 2 drivers, we did that.The fix should not have involved us at all, the Service center did not make the call to you to get this done behind the scenes. It should be a transparent endeavor.  Before Ryder does something like this they need to make sure the Service people know what to do AND Ryder needs to get 2nd shift support to Ryder Hartford for ELD issues after 1st shift.  IT guys and problem solvers after I spent over an hour on this with them were Great.

Review.Titre: Setting up new vehicles
Review.Contenu: The agent I dealt with, (Josh), was very helpful.  I needed assistance setting up two new vehicles on the account, Josh completed the work in minutes and took the time to make sure I was able to view the new records on my side. Much appreciated.

Review.Titre: The functionality of ‘Director’…
Review.Contenu: The functionality of ‘Director’ software is great. The system is easy to use and the reports available are extensive. We have a large fleet so having the support of the Services Specialist and Installation Team has made the transition easy.

Review.Titre: An excellent and professional operation
Review.Contenu: This is my third tracker using Teletrac and on each occasion the staff/installers have been extremely helpful and professional in their dealings with me.The Installer arrived on time and telephoned me on each visit with an expected ETA.

Review.Titre: I spoke with Mario over the last…
Review.Contenu: I spoke with Mario over the last weekend about an issue with a few vehicles. He politely called today to follow up and to make sure the issue had been corrected. As of now the vehicle HOS seem to be working as it should.

Review.Titre: Cesar Franco has spent roughly 10 days…
Review.Contenu: Cesar Franco has spent roughly 10 days in constant contact with me while we worked out connectivity issues with one of our vehicles. He is an invaluable employee and a great face for the Teletrac Tech Team.

Review.Titre: I think it may be helpful if there was…
Review.Contenu: I think it may be helpful if there was a diagram of parts and the correct terminology for the parts for vehicle tracking and ELDs. This would allow for us the customer to be on the same level when talking to the technicians.

Review.Titre: Customer Support
Review.Contenu: Over the last two years, I’ve had to call customer support on numerous occasions and was placed on hold for over an hour (or more), and several times technicians would drop the ball and not follow through as promised. Most of the cases had to be escalated to an advance tier 2 group and it sometimes took several days to resolve an issue. We have had many up and downs with Teletrac, but they have come a long way and have made a few changes to offer better customer support. On this occasion, Lori Herrera did an outstanding job to fix an issue that no other technician has been able to resolve for the past 5 months. She was quite knowledgeable and went above and beyond to solve the issue.

Review.Titre: Joel was very helpful in resolving our…
Review.Contenu: Joel was very helpful in resolving our issue with a tablet that was not  working properly.  He followed up to make sure we were satisfied with the results.  He was very polite and professional to deal with.

Review.Titre: We recently had one of our trucks…
Review.Contenu: We recently had one of our trucks stolen on a jobsite, and thanks to Teletrac we were able to locate the vehicle within hours of it being stolen and have the local police department recover it with minimal damage.

Review.Titre: Great service, great people.
Review.Contenu: The tech support is fantastic, and the service itself is the best we've seen. However, setup and migration is somewhat disorganized at times, so be aware.

Review.Titre: Unit not tracking
Review.Contenu: It took just a little too long between the time of calling in the repair request and someone contacting me to schedule.  Other than that, the repairman showed up when scheduled and fixed the problem.

Review.Titre: Support is very good and responsive
Review.Contenu: Support is very good and responsive. Carlos and Shelton are great to work with!The only challenge I have is with the reliability of the QT 200 units. Carlos is very familiar with my concerns.

Review.Titre: Having had an IT issue on my new phone…
Review.Contenu: Having had an IT issue on my new phone I made contact with thecall centre and was lead through the whole process with patience and good humour.....the operator was a credit to your company

Review.Titre: Track First then Call
Review.Contenu: I am appreciative that they call me and verify and wait for the bus to be on the road before they track it to make sure it is good. Then follow up with me.

Review.Titre: Helpful customer service rep
Review.Contenu: Odin was helpful when I called about an issue with a tracking unit.  He offered insight to the problem based on a report he ran, sent me the report, and we agreed on next steps.

Review.Titre: Very responsive
Review.Contenu: Very responsive, but unable to resolve any of the issues while on the phone. Helped create (2) cases and directed them to my account manager. Hopefully good resolution to come.

Review.Titre: Referance 917584
Review.Contenu: Referance 917584Called for several issues/questions on new Director platform, Cesar F. was very friendly, open and thorough in looking into a resolution for me.

Review.Titre: Very helpful
Review.Contenu: reference number – 1010091-JoeJoe was not able to fix a problem, but he gave me a number to contact and he gave me a lot of helpful information.

Review.Titre: Really appreciate the help and time…
Review.Contenu: Really appreciate the help and time your customer service rep Mabel Freytag has given us! She has been at hand throughout helping to sort out our requirements efficiently.

Review.Titre: Original case had been closed
Review.Contenu: Original case had been closed, although no contact had been made or the issue fixed.  The CSR eventually figured out the issue and escalated it.  The issue was then fixed.

Review.Titre: Cesar F
Review.Contenu: Cesar F. was very helpful in resolving issues for multiple cases and informative about troubleshooting down the line. Very professional and courteous.

Review.Titre: Better than the other two telematics providers I tried.
Review.Contenu: Teletrac has added customer support specialists within the last year. This has improved the customer support experience exponentially. They are basically your advocate to make sure any issues you are having get resolved in a timely manner. You can contact them directly and then they talk to any other departments that are involved in getting the issue resolved. It is a much better customer support system now. While Teletrac has been having issues with their new Director platform that they updated to in May, it is largely due to Nationwide cellular network issues because of the update to LTR. I tried two other companies over a period of two months and neither of them could give me a working system because of the LTE updates nor did they have the features that Teletrac has. I'm back with Teletrac and we are resolving the issues with our telematics system.

Review.Titre: Response was detailed.
The customer service staff is very…
Review.Contenu: The customer service staff is very patient and helpful. We have had many ups and downs with Teletrac and I think they have come a long way with that piece.

Review.Titre: Good service
Review.Contenu: Customer service agents are always polite and try to be helpful.  Unfortunately, it doesn't seem like there is a standard procedure for troubleshooting.

Review.Titre: Rep helped and fixes the issue
Review.Contenu: Rep helped and fixes the issue.  very freiendly

Review.Titre: Mario Rodriquez

Review.Titre: Sergio was excellent at keeping me in…

Review.Titre: Assisted me immediately in solving my…
Review.Contenu: Assisted me immediately in solving my issues.  All but 1 issue cleared up with first phone call, last issue cleared up within 1/2 of phone call.

Review.Titre: It took a few days of conversations via…
Review.Contenu: It took a few days of conversations via email, but the issues I was having were resolved. Support was polite and knowledge and nice to deal with.

Review.Titre: I got a quick phone answer and after…

Review.Titre: The customer service reps are helpful…
Review.Contenu: The customer service reps are helpful and answer any questions I have and have made sure I fully understand the answer before we end the call.

Review.Titre: While systems are continually updating…

Review.Titre: Navman shows me and the team exactly…

Review.Titre: not connect to VLU
Review.Contenu: They were quick to repair my issue. Only one thing to say. we tend to have the same issue keep coming back to keep use from  logging in. Why?

Review.Contenu: Very nice and helpful

Review.Titre: I thought your operators were very…
Review.Contenu: I thought your operators were very helpful and very knowledgeable and my issues were solved and thank you for your patience with us

Review.Titre: Great help
Review.Contenu: Great help, with a potentially tricky situation.  Answered all my questions and provided solutions for me and my team.. Great work

Review.Titre: It would be great if someone could…

Review.Contenu: Some customer support reps are hard to understand when trying to speak English. Would be five stars if communication improves.

Review.Titre: Secretary
Review.Contenu: I really appreciated the costumer service i received. The guy was very knowledgeable when it came to fixing my problem thanks!!

Review.Titre: I finally spoke with a technician that…
Review.Contenu: I finally spoke with a technician that could explain what was happening with the error and why they are occurring.Thank you

Review.Titre: Things have been progressing for us the…
Review.Contenu: Things have been progressing for us the more we families ourselves with the equipment.  Good response time on the repairs.

Review.Titre: Started off kind of rough
Review.Contenu: Started off kind of rough. Slow response to issues, but they have greatly improved in response time and customer service.

Review.Titre: The Garmin ELD is good.
Review.Contenu: The Garmin ELD is good.  It is user friendly.  Takes minimal training for our drivers to use it adequately.  We chose Teletrac because we were able to avoid having a carrier, like a phone company and having to depend on loss of service.  We like the satellite system that is attained by using the Garmin.  We've had a few issues, that needed to be handled.  The reason I'm giving 4 stars is that we like the product, however the customer service started out very rough.  Very long wait times.  That has improved, however, when call backs are promised they don't usually happen and I end up having to call them back.  I don't know where the ball gets dropped, but it does.  We do have trouble with the unit going OFFLINE.  Sometimes getting it back ONLINE takes a few tries and then wait time for all of the information, that has been stored, to be uploaded.  There are times we have to wait til next day to make sure the system has updated.  It doesn't happen often enough to warrant looking for another company.  All things considered, we will still stay with Teletrac.

Review.Titre: Not happy about how long it took to get…
Review.Contenu: Not happy about how long it took to get the help, but, Sara Identified the cause of the issue and knew how to fix it.

Review.Titre: Process took too long for moving this…
Review.Contenu: Process took too long for moving this truck from Navman to Rydesmart where it should have been in the first place.
Joel was helpful in walking me through our Dash Cam issues, and scheduling replacement cameras as needed.

Review.Titre: Best Tech
Review.Contenu: I called and got Axl Chairez. First, I want to say that the last few times I have contacted tech support, I have been upset with the results. I did not feel they truly tried to understand the issues or tried to help. It was more "we are having issues and they should correct itself shortly". And that was after being on hold for over an hour. Well, today, thinking I might have the same issue I was first surprised that the call was answered quickly, and I got Axl. I remember his voice from a few times I have talked with him before, a few months back. Well, he not only helped me, helped me understand what I am seeing, helpled me correct the issue and he followed up twice. Just to make sure I was good. This is not only the first time he has helped me completely. If I could have one tech assigned to me, I would request Axl. Thank you, Axl, for all of your help every time I got to talk to you.
